title: This year, GOP election deniers got a free pass from Twitter and Facebook
description: A Washington Post review of social media found scores of misleading posts by Republicans candidates who've denied the legitimacy of the 2020 presidential election. But none was flagged as misleading by the social media companies.

title: These are the men running Elon Musk’s Twitter
description: Elon Musk fired Twitter's top executives the night he took control of the company. Here are the people he's put in charge to replace them, for now.

title: Musk’s celebrity lawyer now plays key role in Twitter overhaul
description: Alex Spiro went from representing Jay-Z to participating in one of the biggest technology company overhauls in years.

title: DRX beats T1 to win 2022 League of Legends World Championship
description: South Korean team DRX pulled a surprise victory over T1, the three-time Worlds winners. In the venue, the announcers described it as “a miracle run.”
